article_title: As With Most Issues, Trump Candidacy Offers Few Details But Much Sound & Fury On Healthcare

article_metadata.description: Donald Trump has provided few details but has trashed ObamaCare on the campaign trail. What would he do to change the healthcare system if he is elected President?
article_metadata.author: John Osborn
